title: All Profiles
description: Prospecting across your entire donor database
body:
Filtering in Parent-Child Troubleshooting Login Email Issues and User Accessaccount setupTroubleshooting Login Email Issues and User Accessaccount Structures

For consultant partnerships managing multiple client sub-accounts: When viewing All Profiles from a parent Troubleshooting Login Email Issues and User Access" blankaccount setup" blankTroubleshooting Login Email Issues and User Access" blankaccount, you can see donors across all child accounts with Troubleshooting Login Email Issues and User Access" blankaccount setup" blankTroubleshooting Login Email Issues and User Access" blankaccount identifiers.

Filtering Capabilities

  • Status filtering: Works correctly from parent Troubleshooting Login Email Issues and User Access" blankaccount setup" blankTroubleshooting Login Email Issues and User Accessaccount view

  • Tag filtering: Currently limited for tags created at parent levelWorkaround: Access individual child accounts to filter by tagsAlternative: Use Status fields for parent-level prospect management

  • Workaround: Access individual child accounts to filter by tags

  • Alternative: Use Status fields for parent-level prospect management

  • Donors display with sub-Troubleshooting Login Email Issues and User Access" blankaccount setup" blankTroubleshooting Login Email Issues and User Access" blankaccount abbreviations to identify source Troubleshooting Login Email Issues and User Access" blankaccount setup" blankTroubleshooting Login Email Issues and User Access" blankaccount

  • Use search functionality to locate specific donors across all child accounts
